meanings.definition: Dance in a wild and energetic manner typically involving pushing and shoving.
meanings.sent1: At the party, everyone was moshing to the loud music.
meanings.sent2: The crowd started moshing when the band began to play.
meanings.sent3: The kids were moshing around the living room, bumping into furniture.
meanings.sent4: The waves moshed against the shore with great force.
meanings.sent5: Moshing in the rain made the dance even more exhilarating.

meanings.definition: The act of participating in a mosh pit at a concert or music event.
meanings.sent1: I got a bruise from moshing in the mosh pit last night.
meanings.sent2: The energy in the mosh pit was electrifying as people were moshing.
meanings.sent3: The moshing in the pit looked like a chaotic but fun dance.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of people, moshing was the only way to move.
meanings.sent5: The moshing at the concert left everyone feeling alive and connected.
